csw:Record.dc:title: Orbital Ground Tracks - Metop C
csw:Record.dc:subject: Cloud
csw:Record.dct:abstract: Single orbital ground tracks of platform METOP-C, for Advanced Very High Resolution Radiometer (AVHRR) instrument. The product displays the path that the satellite "draws" on the surface of Earth while moving in a geosynchronous orbit. From every single orbit it is possible to access to all the Product Dissemination Units (PDUs) included in that orbit. Each PDU contains 3 minutes of measurements. There are approximately 33/34 PDUs per orbit. For every PDU, the starting time is provided, in format YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ.
